Sentencas: A combined system containing solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), solar parabolic dish, double effect LiBr-H20 absorption chiller system and organic Rankine cycle is modeled and analyzed to design a novel poly generation system producing: electricity, space heating and cooling and domestic hot water, for a commercial tower in Tehran.
Titulo: Optimal design and economic analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and parabolic solar dish collector, combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) system used for a large commercial tower

Sentencas: The system also contains a number of auxiliary components required for the balance of the plant, such as: compressors, pumps, heat exchangers and etc. Developed electrochemical model of the fuel cell using the MATLAB software is validated with experimental results.
Titulo: Optimal design and economic analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and parabolic solar dish collector, combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) system used for a large commercial tower

Sentencas: Results indicate that electrical efficiency of the solid oxide fuel cell, electrical efficiency of the combined system and overall thermal efficiency of the system are 41.49%, 48.73% and 79.49% respectively.
Titulo: Optimal design and economic analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and parabolic solar dish collector, combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) system used for a large commercial tower

Sentencas: Investment cost for the cogeneration system is computed 3.470 million dollar.
Titulo: Optimal design and economic analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and parabolic solar dish collector, combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) system used for a large commercial tower

Sentencas: The simple payback period is obtained 4.43 years.
Titulo: Optimal design and economic analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and parabolic solar dish collector, combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) system used for a large commercial tower
